card.name: Snail Pen
card.description: {{KW:MAGIC}}: Select an ally Snail (except {{CARD:498|1}}). {{KW:DELAY}}: Kill it and add 3 exact copies of it to your hand.

description.now: {{KW:MAGIC}}: Select an ally Snail (except {{CARD:498|1}}). {{KW:DELAY}}: Kill it and add 3 exact copies of it to your hand.
description.prev: Whenever you summon a {{TRIBE:SNAIL|1}} with a base {{COST}} of 2 or less, trigger its {{KW:MAGIC}} effect.
